short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find images on web pages, sort them by resolution or format, download one image or select all to bulk download

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What is Image Downloader - Image Finder?
Image Downloader - Image Finder is a unique Chrome extension designed to streamline image downloading from websites. This tool finds all images on a website, displays them in a thumbnail view, and offers the option to download all or selected images easily. It also allows users to filter images by width, height, and URL, and opens individual images in new tabs. Image Downloader - Image Finder supports all major websites, making it a versatile tool for various image download needs.
